short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cute 3D companion that lives in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Foryu allows you to browse the web with your favorite characters. 

How it works:
1. Use a 4 digit code to download a character (join our Discord for free codes!).
2. Your foryu will naturally walk around your browser, you can interact with them by dragging them around.
3. You can toggle through different animations and expressions by right-clicking on them.
4. Create your own Foryus by uploading a VRM model and share the 4-letter code with your community!

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/Y8XmWXGT
